page.title: 02Notable Events
page.content: {THE CARNIVAL SOCIETY}Mrs.K.Pettit is the Secretary of the East Hoathly & Halland Carnival Society which was started in 1919. It runs many events like the Pram Race, Beetle Drive, Shows and Dances. It helps many Charities like the Sunshine Home for Blind Babies, Brighton and Hove Spastic Society and many others. Its main event is Bonfire Night in November. Last year it raised Â£660. {THE CHURCH GARDEN PARTY }The Rector's wife, Mrs.Jean Amos, organises the Garden Party. It is on the second Saturday in July in the Rectory garden. She is helped by members of the church. It is in aid of Church Funds and Â£500-Â£600 a year. {THE VILLAGE SHOW}The Horticultural Society holds a show each Spring and Autumn and is in its 13th year of being.
